entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning early this evening. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 5:08 PM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:08 PM CST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 21.
